patthana15.7:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.7:1.1_0: Because of the way of rapture, the principle of pleasure and pain doesn’t arise.
patthana15.7:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.7:2.1_0: There is a thing that gives rise to bliss. There is no cause or reason for the sake of bliss.
patthana15.7:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.7:3.1_0: Because of equanimity, there is no cause or condition for the reason.
patthana15.7:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
